title: Your Best Defense Against Ransomware: Akamai + Guardicore
description: For decades, Akamai has been focused on solving tough problems for our customers. We started by addressing the challenges of the ?World Wide Wait,? and quickly started to leverage our edge network?s scale, proximity to users, and expert operations staff to mitigate security threats for our customers. Today, Akamai has category-leading solutions including DDoS, web app and API protection, bot management, and Zero Trust Network Access. Given the incredible surge in ransomware attacks, we are excited to be adding Zero Trust segmentation to our portfolio through the acquisition of Guardicore.
author: Ari Weil
